title: Can we bring in a temporary ban for not feeding the Poros?
body: At the end of every Aram I look at players items and it breaks my heart to see biscuits still left uneaten. Just thinking about the hungry Poros brings a single tear to my eye. Think about it, right now out there is a hungry, lonely Poro just looking for a friend and we deny him a single tasty treat. Please, we must punish these heartless bastards. Think of the Poros!

replies.body: I always sell my poro snax to the shopkeeper for 0 gold.
I never give {{item:2052}}  to poro, so I give it to {{champion:79}}
There needs to be a ping that the enemy team can see too that means "feed this poro"
But if we keep feeding the Poro who knows what will happen. I mean, look at Sejuani.
I've had people call others murderers because the other team didn't feed their poros. Me i **always** feed my poro pal. Specially when i'm playing as Braum in ARAM.
YES! This must be a thing! Or at least a reprimand where something tells the player that they've been a horrible person :(
